rules_text:
When you cast this spell from your hand, it gains vanishing 3. [i](This enters with three time counters on it. At your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Suspend 3–{U} [i](Rather than casting this, you may pay {U} to exile it with three time counters. At your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, cast it for free. It has haste.)[/i]
